attributes.action: stop politicians of all persusions covertly encouraging unfortunate migrants to come here for a cheap wage and pay indigenous citizens a proper wage instead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We can all see that the english business and government covertly wants migrants for cheap labour instead of british workers with proper wages and conditions so please stop all this lies and rubbish about humanity!!!

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
